description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Inventory_Storage_LocationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Inventory_Storage_LocationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Inventory_Storage_LocationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The reference to an existing Inventory Storage Location for update purposes only.

Inventory_Storage_Location_Data.description: The reference ID of the Inventory Storage Location.

validation.validation: Inventory Storage Location Reference ID does not match ID of Inventory Storage Location Parm.

Inventory_Storage_Location_Data.description: The name of the Inventory Storage Location.

Location_AbstractObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Location_AbstractObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Location_AbstractObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Inventory_Storage_Location_Data.description: The reference to the Superior Location of the Inventory Storage Location.

validation.validation: Unable to assign the superior location because the selected inventory location has a current inventory transaction, and its inventory site is different than the site of the superior location.
Unable to remove the superior location because the selected inventory location has a current inventory transaction.
Assigning this superior location would create a circular reference.

description: The element that contains the Inventory Storage Location data.

validation.validation: A zone already exists in the location chain.
